creator: Valamis
descriptionHtml:
Valamis brings your learning together in one place so you can gain the knowledge you need no matter where you are. Find learning resources to improve your skills, gain expertise, and become more productive at work to achieve your biggest and brightest goals.

Available on any device, Valamis helps you find new content and track your learning whether you’re on the subway, at the beach, at work, or on Mars - but make sure to download offline lessons before any space travel!

Use Valamis on your mobile device to:

- Find new lessons and learning paths and track your progress
- Participate in learning activities and enroll in events on-the-go
- Browse and submit assignments from your device
- Access millions of learning courses from our content partners like LinkedIn Learning

Valamis is a learning experience platform designed to provide a personalized learning experience to your employees, partners, and customers. The application can be customized and branded for your business.

Having trouble? Please reach out to support@valamis.com
descriptionShort: Valamis mobile app lets users bring their elearning experience to mobile devices

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Possibility to sync training event with system calendar
• Show failed learning path goals
• Assignment as the goal of the learning path
• Bug fixes

title: Valamis

creator: Valamis
descriptionHtml:
Valamis is a learning experience platform designed to provide a personalised learning experience to your employees, partners, and customers. Valamis brings your learning together in one place so you can gain the knowledge you need no matter where you are. Find learning resources to improve your skills, gain expertise, and become more productive at work to achieve your biggest and brightest goals.
Available on any device, Valamis helps you find new content and track your learning whether you’re on the subway, at the beach, at work, or on a flight (make sure to download the materials before your flight)!
Use Valamis Mobile to:
- Find new lessons and learning paths and track your progress
- Participate in learning activities and enroll in events on-the-go
- Browse and submit assignments from your device
- Access millions of learning courses from our content partners like LinkedIn Learning
The mobile application can be white-labeled and designed to match your company’s unique brand.
Is your company interested in taking Valamis Mobile in use? Please contact your Account Manager or support@valamis.com
descriptionShort: Valamis mobile app lets users bring their elearning experience to mobile devices

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added Content Recommendations to the Home page. These are the same recommendations that are shown in web version.
Support for integrated content from Udemy, Harvard, and GetAbstract.
No longer need to download lessons to watch them online
Fixed login view showing up when opening a lesson
Fixed organization course members having to enroll in the course
Fixed an issue with sharing events
Fixed an issue with attached files not visible in Assignments
Fixed minor bugs with deleted items in Saved list

title: Valamis

creator: Valamis
descriptionHtml:
Valamis is a learning experience platform that provides a personalized learning experience for your employees, partners, and customers. Valamis brings all of your learning together in one place, supporting you to learn on the go, wherever you are. Find learning resources to improve your skills, gain expertise and hit your learning and development goals.
Available on any device, the Valamis Mobile App helps you view and complete your learning content anywhere you go. Use the Valamis Mobile App to:
· Find new lessons and learning paths and track your progress.
· Download lessons for offline completion.
· Participate in learning activities and enroll in events on the go.
· Browse and submit assignments from your device.
· Access millions of learning courses from external libraries, like LinkedIn Learning.
To log in, just type in your Valamis portal URL and log in with your credentials.
descriptionShort: Valamis mobile app lets users bring their elearning experience to mobile devices

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added an expired session banner.
- Fixed the splash screen icon.
- Fixed the issue with events and courses not opening in search results.
- The device's dark mode will no longer affect the color of the filter and search bar.
